ygData.subject: ...and the beat goes on...
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, last night, after months of not even trying to work on it, I finished my Singing Short Sword quest. :)  A guild-mate won a scale on  a Vox raid a couple
ygData.messageBody:
Well, last night, after months of not even trying to work on it, I finished my
Singing Short Sword quest. :) A guild-mate won a scale on a Vox raid a couple
weeks ago, and that was the turning point for me. We had I think 9 consecutive
Vox kills with only 1 white scale dropped. It's been rough on MM ;p.

My guild, Deadly Virtues, took the spawned Trakanon down with no problems; our
first Trak kill (like may other servers, it's difficult to find him up to
kill!). We had deaths, but learned a lot so that next time will be much
easier.

I am thrilled with the sword! I think that the effort for our epic is
proportional to its quality.

I wanted to share this with you all, with a hearty 'Thank you' because so much
work has been done by the community, of which we are all a part.

/cheer bards

Maravana Vireo
59 Bard of Deadly Virtues
Mithaniel Marr
